string.name: accountPreferences
string.comment: Displayed on account screen, under the 'Profile' entry. This is for preferences synced with website on the server.

string.name: accountPreferencesHelp
string.comment: Help displayed on the account preferences screen.

resources.string: Nämä asetukset tallentuvat Lichess-tunnukseesi ja tulevat käyttöön kaikilla laitteilla.

string.name: allGames
string.comment: This is shown instead of 'Number of Games' if the number could not be loaded

string.name: areYouSure
string.comment: This is shown in confirmation dialogs.

string.name: boardSettings
string.comment: This is shown in the app main settings screen, which opens a screen dedicated to chess board settings.

string.name: cancelTakebackOffer
string.comment: Menu action that cancels a previous takeback offer

string.name: clearButton
string.comment: Buttons that clear things, e.g. recent searches. Should be short.

string.name: correspondenceClearSavedMove
string.comment: This is shown in the correspondence game screen. Will clear the saved move.

string.name: customGameJoinAGame
string.comment: This is shown in the custom game screen. Will open the game lobby.

string.name: feedbackButton
string.comment: Shown in the settings, pressing this button will redirect to the lichess contact site.

string.name: hideVariation
string.comment: Shown in the analysis screen.

string.name: homeTab
string.comment: The tab in bottom navigation bar. Must be very short (10 characters max) to avoid ugly text shifting issues.

string.name: liveStreamers
string.comment: This is shown as a heading in the streamer screen

string.name: mustBeLoggedIn
string.comment: This is shown when the user tries to access a feature that requires login.

resources.string: Sinun täytyy olla kirjautuneena nähdäksesi tämän sivun.

string.name: noSearchResults
string.comment: This is shown when the search did not return any results.

string.name: notFollowingAnyUser
string.comment: This is shown in the list that contains user followed by the user. Displayed if the user does not follow any users.

string.name: okButton
string.comment: This is used in varius confirmations dialogs. Translation should be short.

string.name: overTheBoard
string.comment: Used in the main play menu to launch the Over the board game mode.

string.name: playersMatchingSearchTerm
string.comment: This is shown when searching for a player. %s is the string that user entered in the search bar

string.name: positionLeft
string.comment: Appears in the board settings screen to indicate clock position.

string.name: positionRight
string.comment: Appears in the board settings screen to indicate clock position.

string.name: prefMagnifyDraggedPiece
string.comment: Title of a setting the settings screen. When enabled, the piece being dragged around the board will be magnified.

string.name: puzzleStormConfirmEndRun
string.comment: Text of the confirmation dialog when ending a puzzle storm run

string.name: puzzleStormFilterNothingToShow
string.comment: Shown when the user has no puzzles matching the filter criteria

string.name: puzzleStormNothingToShow
string.comment: Shown when the user has not played any puzzle storm runs yet. Prefer to not translate Puzzle Storm.

resources.string: Ei näytettävää. Pelaa ensin muutama sarja Puzzle Stormia.

string.name: puzzleStormSubtitle
string.comment: Shown as a description for the 'Puzzle Storm' mode

string.name: puzzleStreakAbortWarning
string.comment: Shown as a subtitle in the confirmation dialog for aborting puzzle streak. Prefer to not translate Puzzle Streak

resources.string: Parhaillaan menossa oleva putkesi päättyy, ja pistemääräsi tallennetaan.

string.name: puzzleThemesSubtitle
string.comment: Shown as a description for the 'Puzzle themes' mode

resources.string: Tee tehtäviä suosikkiavauksistasi tai valitse tehtäväteema.

string.name: puzzlesTab
string.comment: The tab in bottom navigation bar. Must be very short (10 characters max) to avoid ugly text shifting issues.

string.name: recentSearches
string.comment: Title of the recent searches section in the search screen.

string.name: removeBookmark
string.comment: Label of the action of removing a game bookmark. Used in various places of the app where the space in constrained so this should remain short (eg: don't translate as 'Remove game bookmark', keep the essential).

string.name: settingsClockPosition
string.comment: Clock position entry in main settings screen.

string.name: settingsDraggedPieceTarget
string.comment: Dragged piece target entry in main settings screen.

string.name: settingsDraggedTargetCircle
string.comment: Dragged target settings circle type. One of the possible values of 'Dragged piece target' settings.

string.name: settingsDraggedTargetSquare
string.comment: Dragged target settings square type. One of the possible values of 'Dragged piece target' settings.

string.name: settingsHomeWidgets
string.comment: Settings entry. Allow to enable which widgets are displayed on the home screen.

string.name: settingsImmersiveMode
string.comment: Entry in the settings. When enabled, the app will hide the navigation bar and status bar.

string.name: settingsImmersiveModeSubtitle
string.comment: Subtitle for the 'Immersive Mode' setting. Gives an explanation of what the button does.

resources.string: Piilota laitteen käyttöliittymä pelatessasi. Valitse tämä, jos laitteesi navigointieleet näytön laidoilla ovat sinulle häiriöksi. Asetus vaikuttaa peli- ja tehtävänäkymiin.

string.name: settingsMaterialDifferenceCapturedPieces
string.comment: A value of the material difference settings choice (to show all captured pieces instead of material difference).

string.name: settingsTab
string.comment: The tab in bottom navigation bar. Must be very short (10 characters max) to avoid ugly text shifting issues.

string.name: shareGamePGN
string.comment: Menu action that shares the PGN of a game

string.name: shareGameURL
string.comment: Menu action that shares the URL of the current game

string.name: sharePositionAsFEN
string.comment: Menu action that shares the current position as a FEN string

string.name: sharePuzzle
string.comment: This is shown in the puzzle screen. When pressed, the user can share the puzzle.

string.name: showComments
string.comment: Shown in the analysis screen.

string.name: showResult
string.comment: This is the label of a button in the bottom bar shown when viewing a game from your history. Pressing the button will open a dialog showing the game's result (e.g 'White resigned') and displaying button such as 'new opponent'

string.name: showVariations
string.comment: Shown in the analysis screen.

string.name: somethingWentWrong
string.comment: This is a generic text to be shown when something unexpected happens, e.g. failing to load data from the server.

string.name: systemColors
string.comment: The title of the system colors setting. When enabling this, tha app's colors will match those of the operating system.

string.name: theme
string.comment: Graphic theme section in the global app settings.

string.name: toolsTab
string.comment: The tab in bottom navigation bar. Must be very short (10 characters max) to avoid ugly text shifting issues. Currently this includes the analysis board, the chess clock, and importing a position by PGN/FEN

string.name: unsupportedVariant
string.comment: Shown when trying to access/play a variant not yet supported in the app.

resources.string: Variantti %s ei ole tuettu tässä versiossa.

string.name: waitingForOpponentToJoin
string.comment: This is after the user has created a game and is waiting for an opponent to join.

string.name: watchTab
string.comment: The tab in bottom navigation bar. Must be very short (10 characters max) to avoid ugly text shifting issues.
